scenes.background: You agreed to start on the report first. [Bob] glances at his watch.
scenes.description: [Bob] says, 'Time's running short. Maybe we should reconsider the task division.'

options.text: Let's stick to the plan and adjust if necessary.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation by sticking to the plan but may lack empathy by not considering the urgency.

options.text: You're right, Bob. Let's reassign tasks to better manage our time.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and emotional perception by agreeing to reassess the tasks but may affect self-regulation.

options.text: How about we tackle the most critical parts of each task first?
options.analysis: You balance social skills and motivation well by suggesting a focused approach, though self-regulation might be lower.
